message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate your product, $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to offer $9,000 for it. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $10,500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $10,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with, but I'm willing to go up to $10,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but I'd like to add a small premium for the value the product will bring to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,200. This is my final counteroffer.
